item.title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows ‘Claws of Awaji’ DLC Gameplay Trailer Revealed
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/shadows-claws-of-awaji-dlc/

The first gameplay trailer for Assassin’s Creed Shadows, the ‘Claws of Awaji,’ has been released.

Following a slew of announcements of Assassin’s Creed Shadows, Ubisoft has released its first gameplay trailer of its first DLC called ‘Claws of Awaji‘.

The trailer reveals that the DLC will feature 10+ hours of content, a new region, weapon, side activities, gear, and skills. You can watch the full Claws of Awaji DLC trailer below:

Here is the trailer for the Claws of Awaji expansion of Assassin’s Creed Shadows! It will be available “Later in 2025”

As pointed out in the trailer, the DLC will also be entirely free for those who pre-order Assassin’s Creed Shadows on the PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

RELATED – Intel Is Giving Away Civilization 7 And Assassin’s Creed Shadows With CPU Purchase

Following two delays, Assassin’s Creed Shadows will now be released on March 20, 2025.

Are you looking forward to Assassin’s Creed Shadows? Join the discussion and let us know down below, and join more discussions in the official Insider Gaming forums.

For more Insider Gaming, check out our exclusive on two titles set to come to Xbox Game Pass in February and what NASCAR series is making its console game debut in iRacing’s NASCAR 25. And don’t forget to sign up for our newsletter.

EA Stock Drops 17% Following Dragon Age: The Veilguard’s Disappointing Sales

The 17% drop is one of EA’s most significant drops in stock value ever following its Q3 2025 financial report.

DOOM: The Dark Ages Won’t Have Multiplayer

ID Software confirmed on Thursday that DOOM: The Dark Ages won’t have multiplayer when it releases on May 15.

DOOM: The Dark Ages Full PC Specs Revealed

Bethesda and id Software have revealed the full PC specs for the May 2025 release of DOOM: The Dark Ages.

DOOM: The Dark Ages Collector’s Bundle Comes With DOOM Slayer Statue

Bethesda and ID Software have announced the availability of the DOOM: The Dark Ages Collector’s Bundle that includes a DOOM Slayer statue.
